snippet.textDisplay:
I have a lost korean song i found around 2018 the music was so catchy its still stuck on my head



Hi! Iâ€™ve been trying to find a Korean song I listened to on YouTube around 2018 (possibly earlier, maybe 2016â€“2017). I don't remember the title or lyrics because everything was in Korean, but I clearly remember the album cover or YouTube thumbnail.

Hereâ€™s what I remember:

It was sung by a solo female vocalist (I think only one person sang)

The song was upbeat/cheery, not sad or emotional

The album art/thumbnail was very simple and likely digitally drawn

It showed a large sun in the sky, with the ocean below it

Possibly had birds in the sky

The background was white or light-colored, and the drawing was flat/stylized, the album cover is not realistic from what i can recall its simply flat

I even drew it from memory, hereâ€™s my sketch:

     ___________________          
          /            \          
          |              |    â† Big round sun
           \______/       
 
       â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ â† Horizon (ocean)
      ~    ~    ~    ~     â† Calm sea |        




Iâ€™m desperate to find this song againâ€”itâ€™s stuck in my head with no melody! If you recognize the cover style or even have any guesses, Iâ€™d really appreciate the help ğŸ™
